nodes.text: Wodanian wood-sprites were tiny beings with which Amaiza Foxtrain was familiar. She claimed that Merri Shen Doshun was only slightly larger than the species. They were from Wodan, a planet located within the Rifle Worlds of the Hapes Cluster.
Wodanian wood-sprites were created by Roy Thomas and were mentioned in the dialog of Star Wars 9, published in 1978. The Essential Atlas, published in 2009, created a planet based on this name.
